name: NTNGL
description:
You are a scientist who is controlling an experiment with two particles joined by quantum entanglement. When they are close, they are linked by a beam of energy. When they are far, they lose energy and die. Keep the particles alive as long as possible!

Switch which particle you control in order to survive attacks from three different types of dark matter particles. Enemy particles are destroyed by the energy link created by your particles.

Controls:

Left/Right/Up/DownMove current particleXSwitch particles (if currently linked)

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in Pico-8.
